item.title: 10 Most Useful Prompt Engineering Tips and Tricks
item.description: As a prompt engineer, your goal is to design effective prompts that help guide an AI language model like ChatGPT to produce useful and relevant responses. Here are some useful tips and tricks for prompt engineering:
